attributes.action: An Independent Commission to determine how much input the EU has on UK law
attributes.additional_details:
Every different party has a different percentage on how much input the EU has on UK law, but how are we meant to vote on whether we should remain in the EU if there is no concrete percentage on the power the EU has over the country?
That is why I propose an independent commission (so there is no bias) to determine the actual percentage the EU has over the UK.
